name: Wireless Dog Fence System for 2 Dogs, 2025 Upgraded 2-in-1 Electric Fence & Training Collar, Portable Perimeter Dog Collar with Remote Control, Waterproof, Adjustable Range up to 985 ft
short_description: 2025 Upgraded 2-in-1 Wireless Fence & Training System:This 2-in-1 wireless dog fence system combines a wireless perimeter dog collar and a remote training collar in one device. Powered by advanced 2.4GHz wireless signal technology, it delivers stable performance and accurate boundary recognition for daily training and outdoor containment.

Adjustable Perimeter Range with Progressive Correction:The wireless dog fence offers an adjustable boundary radius from 30 ft up to 985 ft (Levels 1–16). When your dog approaches or crosses the boundary, the collar activates progressive correction—beep first, then vibration, and optional static—guiding your dog back safely instead of sudden punishment.

Customizable Training Modes for Different Dogs:In training mode, the system provides sound, vibration, and static correction with 9 adjustable intensity levels, allowing you to customize training based on your dog’s size, temperament, and experience. Includes silicone prong caps to enhance comfort and reduce skin irritation.

Stable Signal Design for Outdoor Use:Designed specifically for open outdoor environments such as yards, gardens, and farms. For best performance, the transmitter should be placed at least 3 ft above ground and away from metal objects or thick walls. Environmental factors may affect range, which is normal for wireless fence systems.

Waterproof Collar, Safe Fit & Reliable Support:The IP66 waterproof dog perimeter collar is suitable for rain and splashes. A reflective TPU strap improves nighttime visibility. Supports up to 2 dogs with additional collars. Backed by 24/7 customer support to assist with setup, pairing, range adjustment, and troubleshooting.

name: GPS Wireless Dog Fence System, Electric Dog Fence Using GPS Electric Satellite Technology, IPX7 Waterproof Rechargeable Design, GPS Dog Collar has 2 Modes Circular and Free-Form Fence
short_description: 【GPS Wireless Dog Fence System】Electric Electric Dog Fence using GPS electric satellite technology, Experience greater accuracy and precision with our newest GPS Fence, which makes you more flexible when setting boundaries,the collar receives signals from GPS satellites, and if the dog approaches the set boundary, it triggers corrective actions，making it the ideal choice for reliable boundary containment.

【2 Modes of Electric Dog Fence】Our wireless dog fence offers two modes: "circular fence" and "free-form fence". ① Circular fence: To quickly set a daily activity range for pets, select a center point and radius distance between 49ft and 6561ft to generate a standard circular invisible fence within 3 seconds. ② Custom polygonal fence: Set multiple vertices to freely outline the shape of the fence, achieving precise protection without dead corners and fitting the real terrain, providing comprehensive protection for every complex home environment

【No Burial Wire Needed】 Our advanced GPS collar creates a completely customizable, invisible barrier for your yard, park, or farm，GPS Wireless Dog Fences do not require any physical installation. This means you can quickly set up and modify the boundaries without worrying about digging trenches or installing posts.

【Rechargeable Waterproof Sealing System】The GPS dog fence can be fully charged within 3 hours, can work for a long time -24 hours when fully charged, making it easy to charge the GPS collar no matter where it is. The dog fence system is IPX7 waterproof, and the collar is adjustable, making it suitable for use by large, medium, and large dogs to meet their daily needs.

【Outdoor Use Only】dog fence collar receives signals from GPS satellites,It can only be used outdoors, Most effective outdoors, such as courtyards/parks, beaches, farms, or camping,and if the dog approaches the set boundary, it triggers corrective actions,The rechargeable battery provides extended use,Suitable for various weather conditions and terrains, it is perfect for all day outdoor exploration, allowing you to feel at ease.

name: GPS Wireless Dog Fence System - Electric Training Collar with Free App for Dogs
short_description: 【PetFences Free APP】 The app for the GPS Wireless Fence is totaly free with no hidden charges or subscription fees. The wireless fence system is easy to use, allowing you to set up virtual fences for up to 5 dogs simultaneously. Adjustable silicon collar sizes range from 8-25 inches, suitable for dogs over 3 months old. The boundary radius can be customized from 65 feet to 3280 feet, with precise 1-foot increments for accurate adjustments.

【2-in-1 Fence + Trainer: Faster Results, Easier Use】 Lilyeel’s collar pairs APP-controlled electric fences with a handheld remote—so you set boundaries and train first. Use the remote to teach your dog: tones/vibrations mean “head back.” This quick training step ensures the fence works flawlessly later. Stable GPS keeps boundaries reliable; 1-button remote makes training easy, even for new owners. Safe, simple, and ready for worry-free outdoor time.

【Circular & Polygonal Fences】 Draw freeform circular or polygonal fences in seconds via the intuitive app— When your dog nears the boundary, the collar triggers a gentle audio/vibration reminder. Keep them safe while letting them run freely, no matter your yard’s layout. Precise, flexible, and easy to set up.

【Adjustable Alarm Intensity】Lilyeel GPS wireless fence system offers customizable correction modes, including sound, vibration, and electric shock, tailored to your dog's adaptability. sound/vibration (1-9 levels) and shock (1-99 levels) to fit your medium dog’s energy and size. There are 3 alarm combination ensures personalized training plans based on your dog's size, personality, and adaptability, making training more effective and comfortable for both you and your pet.

【Long battery life & IP7 waterproof】The GPS electric fence Equipped with a rechargeable battery, the system provides up to 72 hours of continuous use on a single charge, featuring an intelligent power-saving mode. When your dog remains stationary for 2 minutes, the device automatically enters sleep mode to conserve energy; it instantly wakes up upon detecting movement, ensuring longer battery life and convenient daily use. With an IP7 waterproof rating, the collar functions normally in rain, during swimming, or on muddy ground, perfectly meeting the needs of active and lively dogs.

name: PetSafe Guardian GPS 2.0 Dog Fence + Tracking - Wireless GPS Dog Fence - Real-Time Tracking - Custom Boundaries System - Waterproof Collar - Comfortable Fit
short_description: Protect Dog Safely: The PetSafe Guardian GPS 2.0 Dog Fence + Tracking delivers a wireless GPS dog fence and real-time tracking for secure containment and peace of mind
Train With Confidence: This smart dog collar uses tone vibration mode and static correction mode with a comfortable fit for safe and effective training every day
Enjoy Total Freedom: A GPS pet containment system offers customizable roaming zones and an adjustable neck size with a waterproof collar for outdoor reliability
Global Mission, Local Care: With U.S. roots and worldwide reach, PetSafe delivers vet- and trainer-recommended solutions and exceptional customer support to create fields of joy for pets
25 Years of Trust: Since 1998, PetSafe has created safe, innovative, and trusted products that bring joy, enhance pet lives, and support the lifelong bond between pets and their families
Subscription Required: Includes 50 customizable fences, always-on GPS tracking, and US-based customer care for $9.99 per month or $89 per year. Available with one-month free subscription trial
product_description: Give your dog freedom and safety with the PetSafe Guardian GPS 2.0 Dog Fence + Tracking, the most advanced wireless GPS dog fence with built-in real-time tracking. Unlike traditional underground wire fences, this system requires no digging, no buried wires, and no complex installation. You’ll enjoy quick setup and reliable performance whether at home, traveling, or exploring new areas. The Guardian GPS 2.0 collar is designed with both comfort and safety in mind. It is 50% smaller than the leading competitor, with a lightweight build that makes it easy for your dog to wear. Adjustable to fit necks as small as 8 inches, the collar is suitable for nearly all breeds. With AccuGuard technology, dual-frequency GPS, and real-time motion detection powered by AI, you’ll get highly accurate tracking while ensuring your pet stays secure. This smart collar offers three safe correction modes — tone, vibration, and 10 levels of static — so you can tailor training to your dog’s temperament and needs. The waterproof collar ensures reliable use outdoors in all weather, while the rechargeable battery makes it simple to keep the system powered without constant replacements. Since 1988, PetSafe has been driven by a simple belief: safe, healthy pets lead to happier lives for pets and their families. For over 25 years, we've been dedicated to enhancing the lives of pets and the people who love them, treating every pet as a cherished family member and delivering life-changing innovations designed to enrich every moment. With U.S. roots and a global reach, our vet- and trainer-recommended products are built for every pet and backed by exceptional customer support. From backyards to dog parks, we're on a mission to create fields of joy for happy, healthy, and safe pets.

product_description: The PetSafe Stay & Play Wireless Fence for Stubborn Dogs is a powerful, portable pet containment system designed specifically for high-energy, hard-to-train dogs. Using advanced wireless fence technology, this system creates a secure, invisible boundary perimeter with no digging or buried wires required. The circular boundary can be adjusted to cover up to 3/4 of an acre, offering a flexible and accurate wireless fence solution that sets up in just 1–2 hours. Simply plug in the training transmitter, place the included boundary flags, and customize the range to suit your yard or travel destination. The included waterproof, rechargeable receiver collar features a tone-only mode and five adjustable static correction levels, making it easy to tailor the training to your dog’s temperament. Static-free reentry further reinforces positive behavior. The collar also includes a battery status indicator and fits neck sizes from 6-28 inches, ensuring a secure and comfortable fit for dogs 5 pounds and up. This multi-pet training system supports additional collars, allowing all your pets to enjoy the yard safely. With over 25,000 five-star reviews and recognition as the best wireless fence for persistent dogs by Forbes, the PetSafe Stay & Play Wireless Fence delivers a reliable, expert-recommended way to keep your pets safe, happy, and free to play. Since 1988, PetSafe has been driven by a simple belief: safe, healthy pets lead to happier lives for pets and their families. name: Wireless Dog Fence System for 2 Dogs Electric Wireless Fence for Dogs with 2 Collars 856 Acre Outdoor Boundary Portable Safe Pet Containment System Large Medium Dogs Training Collar with Remote
short_description: New 2-in-1 Advanced Chip: Htcuto wireless dog collar fence system integrates the functions of wireless fence and remote training collar, which is simple and convenient to operate. Allows you to train your dog to stay in the yard or train your pet when you are outdoors, shaping good safety habits.

Safe Wireless Fence Mode: The remote control creates a wireless boundary with 14 levels of adjustable distance from 25 feet to 3500 feet. When your dog crosses the boundary, the remote control and dog collar will beep and vibrate to remind your dog to return. For your dog's safety, the system does not automatically shock; you can manually shock to remind your dog to back away

Adjust Training Level: Up to 6000ft training range. And it has 3 training modes: beep (levels 1-5), vibration (levels 1-9), and Safety Shock (levels 1-30). Long-press vibration and shock can be held for up to 8 seconds at a time, all within safe limits

LONG BATTERY Life: The remote and dog collar recharge quickly, both fully charged within 2 hours, with a standby time of up to 185 days(if the electric dog fence wireless function is turned on, it can be used for about 84 hours)
Suitable for Multiple Dogs: This wireless e-collar has a maximum diameter of 23.6 inches and is suitable for dogs weighing 10-130 lbs. Wireless electric fence for dogs can control up to 4 dogs

IPX7 Waterproof Collar: The dog wireless fence system is waterproof, so your dog can play or train with the wireless fence for dogs in the rain or at the beach, or pool. Note: The remote is not waterproof

Security Keypad Lock & LED Light: The keypad lock can prevent accidental operation and give wrong instructions to the dog. The dog fence outdoor for yard electric is equipped with two flashlight lighting modes, so that you can quickly find your dog in the dark
Quick and Easy Setup In Minutes: No digging, no wires, no WiFi, no data, no subscription fees, and no monthly fees. Use the Htcuto shock fence to set up your virtual electric fence in just minutes
Please Note: The wireless dog fence for 2 dogs does not work while charging

name: MIMOFPET Wireless Dog Fence for 2 Dogs - Covers up to 856-Acre Electric Fence,6000FT Waterproof Collar with Remote,Rechargeable Pet Containment System with 3 Training Modes for Large Medium Dogs
short_description: 【NEW 2 in1 Wireless Fence System】The improved wireless dog collar fence system features a simple operation, allowing you to set it up quickly and easily.MIMOFPET Wireless dog fence with training remote is a combination system that includes both the wireless fence for dogs and the dog training collar train and control your dog's behavior.The electric fence for dogs utilizes dual-directional signal transmission technology, ensuring a stable signal that can be used both indoors and outdoors.

【Portable Dog Fence Wireless】The compact design of this wireless pet fence makes it easy to carry and set up wherever you go, giving you the flexibility to create the boundary for your pet at any location. The wireless dog fence system has 14 levels of range adjustable distance from 25 feet to 3500 feet. When the dog crosses the set boundary line, the receiver collar automatically emit warning beep and vibration, alerting the dog to back away.

【Humane Dog Training Collar】The shock collars for dogs with 3 modes: Beep, Vibrate(1-9 levels) and SAFE Static(1-30 levels).Three different training modes with multiple levels for you to choose from. We recommend starting at a lower level to test the appropriate setting for your dog.Dog shock collar with remote up to 5900ft range allows you to train your dogs easily indoors/outdoors.

【Incredible Battery Life&IPX7 Waterproof 】The rechargeable electric dog fence wireless has long battery life, standby time up to 185 days(If the electronic fence function is turned on, it can be used for about 85 hours.) Tips:Exit wireless dog fence mode when not in use to save power.The training collar for dogs is IPX7 waterproof, ideal for training in any weather and place.

【Security Keypad Lock&LED Light】The keypad lock is specially designed for the safety of dogs, which can effectively prevent accidental misoperation and give wrong instructions to dogs.The dog training remote is also equipped with two flashlight lighting modes so that you can quickly find your far-away dog in the dark.

name: 4-in-1 Wireless Dog Fence System, Electric Fences for Medium Large Dogs, 4 Modes Training Collar with Remote, IPX7 Waterproof, Portable Indoor & Outdoor Safe Pet Containment, Real-Time Display
short_description: 【4-in-1 Wireless Dog Fence System with Camping Essentials】Experience the ultimate convenience with our wireless dog fence and static training collar. Featuring a built-in flashlight, compass, and carabiner clip, it's portable for dogs camping outdoor. Set up your electric fence in minutes with no digging required. Perfect for RV dog fence setups, camping trips, hiking, or backyard use. Keep your pet safe wherever adventure takes you

【Advanced Remote Training Collar with 3300FT Range】Train your dog effectively with Beep, Vibration, and Static Stimulation modes (1-16 levels). The remote training collar with static level offers a 3300 ft training range, ideal for open fields, parks, or large yards. The premium TPU strap adjusts 15-130 lbs, fitting medium-to-large breeds comfortably. Correct unwanted behaviors like barking, digging, or running off—safe, humane, and reliable

【Wireless Fence with Customizable Boundary】Create a secure play area with our wireless dog fence system. Choose from 8 distance levels to set an invisible boundary of 33-656 ft radius. When your dog approaches the edge, the collar emits beep and vibration warnings; Select corrective pulse or harmless pulse mode to match your training style. The electric fence keeps your pet within safe zones without physical barriers

【Remote with Color TFT Screen】The e collar is controlled via a high-resolution color TFT remote that shows your dog's current status—Stay, Walk, Jump, or Running—along with mode, battery life, and stimulation level at a glance. Intuitive buttons and a bright readout let you switch between training and fence modes in seconds, even under bright outdoor light

【IPX7 Waterproof & Long Battery Life】Built for outdoor adventures, the IPX7 waterproof collar handles rain, splashes, and brief submersion without missing a beat. Enjoy 36-48 hours of runtime in fence mode or up to 7 days in training-only mode on a single 2-hour USB recharge. Reliable performance that keeps pace with every hike, camp, or garden play session
